channel.title: Configs?
channel.description:
Does anyone have the configs to use with this interface, or can point me in the right direction of dumping them? Would like to make the interface go with my addition.
[img]http://puu.sh/aewf9/a897150056.jpg[/img]
ID: 10984
Thanks ahead of time.
Edit: Not sure if this helps, opened in Lin's Interface Editor and got this information. [img]http://puu.sh/aexmK/c46a3724fd.png[/img]

item.title: Configs?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I know this is a bit of a gravedig, but I felt it would help people anyway.
Five groups

261 - Idle (Ranges from 0x0 - 0xf)
262 - Help (0x0 is off 0x1 is on
362 - Fishing button ( 0xf8000000 for on, 0xf0000000 for off)
363 - Herbs, Mining, Wood, Fishing (Look below)
729 - Herbs buttons, Hardwood buttons, Hardwood, Farm (Look below)

363
The way that these work is you have a base of 0x9fff0000, which is all categories empty
All four categories modify one of the four zeroes to whatever level it is at. (0-a)

Mining is first
Fishing is second
Herbs is third
Wood is fourth

So if I wanted 1 mining point, 2 fishing points, 2 herb points, and 10 herb points, I would do

0x9fff122a

729
This has a base of 0x000
The first of those three zeroes is the buttons
Each button has a value. Hardwood mahogany = 0x0, Herbs = 0x0, Flax = 0x400, teak = 0x100, Both = 0x200
Since you can only select one of each, the max value is 0x600 meaning Flax and Both is selected as buttons

The second zero is the farm, which as a value of 0x010 for each point distributed, giving it a total of 0x0a0 at maximum level.

The third zero is the hardwood, which as a value of 0x001 for each point distributed, giving it a total of 0x00a at maximum level.

So a selection of Flax and teak with three points in farming and ten points in hardwood would be
0x53a

Read full topic

item.title: Configs?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Thanks for the help, by any chance, do you know how to use the SetConfigs to adjust how many are shown etc? I’ve never really understood how the client works, nor interfaces, so something like this is not known to me.

item.title: Configs?
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

I don’t know if this is what you are looking for but here is a full txt with most (all) configs: https://github.com/Odel/VidyaScape/blob/master/Community%20Configuration%20Package/Interfaces/317%20Interface%20Dump.txt

And for that exact interface here are the configs:

Layout: slot text interface id

10986 Kingdom of Miscellania 10984 10987 Close Window 10984 10990 Mining 10984 10994 Herbs 10984 11011 Coffers: 10984 11029 Wood 10984 11045 Fishing 10984 11064 Idle 10984 11072 500,000 10984 11073 Deposit 10984 11074 Withdraw 10984 11081 Help 10984 11082 10984 11083 10984 11084 10984 11085 10984 11086 10984 11087 10984 11088 10984 11089 10984 11090 10984 11091 10984 11144 Cooked 10984

Read full topic
